title: Wait Until They CUT THE CAKE
body_text:
The Engagement Ring, The Wedding Ring, The
Suffering
EVENT BACKGROUND
FATAL ATTRACTION
was the 189th
East Coast Dodgeball
spectacular produced within the second
Tronolone Era
.
It was originally scheduled for May 5 but was quickly moved to May 12 due to the main event captains' conflicting schedules.
The pre-planned bout featured future bride and groom Joanice Lima against Christopher Adams one week before their anticipated wedding, a match that was accepted on March 9, 2012. It was the 11th
CREAMation Rules
battle in
ECD
history.
MAIN ATTRACTION
In the night's main event, wily veteran and
ECDElitist
Christopher Adams
went one-on-one against his gorgeous future wife and reigning
HitTheHuman Contest
Champion
Joanice Lima
.
CREAMation Rules
- where the losing captain suffers the public embarrassment of a whipped cream pie to the face - were in effect.
It was a grueling, nearly four hour, 12-rounder. The first six games were split equally among the contenders; the back six were owned by the Adams-lead coalition who managed to capture five to Lima's one. The final tally after the last weapon was thrown read "Adams 8, Lima 4".
Classic two-team rules stood until Game 5 when Prison Ball carried the remainder of the event.
STATISTICAL SIGNIFICANCE
FATAL ATTRACTION attracted
twenty three
(23) participants, two higher than the previous presentation, WORLD TOUR, in April. While no new competitors were present, several major returns are noted in Mari Travassos, Grant Cornero, Derek Carty, and Steve Kass.
The
Lima v. Adams confrontation helped boost spectatorship
as well with appearances by Vicki Oliver, Katie Grand, DODGEBALL CX headliner Michael Butler, and yes, even the parents of both Lima and Adams. Additionally, Suki and Logan, the playful dogs of Jon Yochum/Mari Travassos and Jason Teiltelbaum, respectively, were amongst the sideline crowd.
CAPTAINCY STATISTICS
Lima's record unfortunately slips to 0-2-0, having been vanquished by
ECDElite
Hall of Famer Lauren Stopa at
MAYDAY
in May 2011.
Adams became just the third captain (along with Ryan Letsche and John Tronolone) to win two
CREAMation Rules
contests, his first victory coming in September 2007
(see below)
against long-standing rival Kevin Fitzpatrick. Additionally, he becomes the
only
player to captain a team in every full year within the
Tronolone Era
, spanning from 2005-2008 and 2010-2012. His captains record moves to 8-7-1 having lead a team in the second-most number of matches 16 different times behind only Tronolone with 17.
________________________________________
_______________________________
More "PIE In The EYE" Moments
CREAMation 1 | March 24, 2007
→ Kevin Adams & Valerie Winston defeated Lenny Herrera & John Tronolone.
CREAMation 2 | June 9, 2007
→ Justin Pierce & Juan Londono defeated Diana DiBuccio.
CREAMation 3 | September 29, 2007
→ Chris Adams defeated Kevin Fitzpatrick.
CREAMation 4 | December 15, 2007
→ Ryan McCrorey defeated Sascha Basista.
CREAMation 5 | February 9, 2008
→ Lauren Stopa & Ryan Letsche defeated Lauren Winston & Grant Cornero.
CREAMation 6 | March 22, 2008
→ John Tronolone defeated Valerie Winston.
CREAMation 7 | May 24, 2008
→ Ryan Letsche defeated Bobby Vetrano.
CREAMation 8 | September 27, 2008
→ Alison Bertsch defeated Pamela D'Luhy.
CREAMation 9 | November 22, 2008
→ John Tronolone defeated Ryan Letsche.
CREAMation 10 | October 16, 2010
→ Ryan Rafferty, Ashley Hoppe, & Dan Spengeman defeated Julia Dennebaum, Michael Edwards, & Michelle Mullins.
body_html:
The Engagement Ring, The Wedding Ring, The Suffering



  • EVENT BACKGROUND
    FATAL ATTRACTION was the 189th East Coast Dodgeball spectacular produced within the second Tronolone Era.

    It was originally scheduled for May 5 but was quickly moved to May 12 due to the main event captains' conflicting schedules.

    The pre-planned bout featured future bride and groom Joanice Lima against Christopher Adams one week before their anticipated wedding, a match that was accepted on March 9, 2012. It was the 11th CREAMation Rules battle in ECD history.

  • MAIN ATTRACTION
    In the night's main event, wily veteran and ECDElitist Christopher Adams went one-on-one against his gorgeous future wife and reigning HitTheHuman Contest Champion Joanice Lima. CREAMation Rules - where the losing captain suffers the public embarrassment of a whipped cream pie to the face - were in effect.

    It was a grueling, nearly four hour, 12-rounder. The first six games were split equally among the contenders; the back six were owned by the Adams-lead coalition who managed to capture five to Lima's one. The final tally after the last weapon was thrown read "Adams 8, Lima 4".

    Classic two-team rules stood until Game 5 when Prison Ball carried the remainder of the event.

  • STATISTICAL SIGNIFICANCE
    FATAL ATTRACTION attracted twenty three (23) participants, two higher than the previous presentation, WORLD TOUR, in April. While no new competitors were present, several major returns are noted in Mari Travassos, Grant Cornero, Derek Carty, and Steve Kass.

    The Lima v. Adams confrontation helped boost spectatorship as well with appearances by Vicki Oliver, Katie Grand, DODGEBALL CX headliner Michael Butler, and yes, even the parents of both Lima and Adams. Additionally, Suki and Logan, the playful dogs of Jon Yochum/Mari Travassos and Jason Teiltelbaum, respectively, were amongst the sideline crowd.

    CAPTAINCY STATISTICS
    Lima's record unfortunately slips to 0-2-0, having been vanquished by ECDElite Hall of Famer Lauren Stopa at MAYDAY in May 2011.

    Adams became just the third captain (along with Ryan Letsche and John Tronolone) to win two CREAMation Rules contests, his first victory coming in September 2007 (see below) against long-standing rival Kevin Fitzpatrick. Additionally, he becomes the only player to captain a team in every full year within the Tronolone Era, spanning from 2005-2008 and 2010-2012. His captains record moves to 8-7-1 having lead a team in the second-most number of matches 16 different times behind only Tronolone with 17.

    _______________________________________________________________________


    More "PIE In The EYE" Moments

    CREAMation 1 | March 24, 2007
    → Kevin Adams & Valerie Winston defeated Lenny Herrera & John Tronolone.

    CREAMation 2 | June 9, 2007
    → Justin Pierce & Juan Londono defeated Diana DiBuccio.

    CREAMation 3 | September 29, 2007
    → Chris Adams defeated Kevin Fitzpatrick.

    CREAMation 4 | December 15, 2007
    → Ryan McCrorey defeated Sascha Basista.

    CREAMation 5 | February 9, 2008
    → Lauren Stopa & Ryan Letsche defeated Lauren Winston & Grant Cornero.

    CREAMation 6 | March 22, 2008
    → John Tronolone defeated Valerie Winston.

    CREAMation 7 | May 24, 2008
    → Ryan Letsche defeated Bobby Vetrano.

    CREAMation 8 | September 27, 2008
    → Alison Bertsch defeated Pamela D'Luhy.

    CREAMation 9 | November 22, 2008
    → John Tronolone defeated Ryan Letsche.

    CREAMation 10 | October 16, 2010
    → Ryan Rafferty, Ashley Hoppe, & Dan Spengeman defeated Julia Dennebaum, Michael Edwards, & Michelle Mullins.
